Mendokusai

Tartarus

Shadow of the Colossus

22 Feb 2018

I've spent my entire evening watching Day9 play through the new remastered edition of Shadow of the Colossus, and this game is disgustingly gorgeous. It looks genuinely like a painting. After Nier Automata last year I didn't think a prettier game would come out anytime soon, but this might just be one - video games really are an art from now. Who needs "outside" when I have this?
